author: Kevin Lee
title: Best Standing Desks in 2023 - IGN
text:
A solid desk is essential to every workspace or PC battle station, but to take your setup to greater heights—and enjoy few health benefits—a standing desk is the way to go. The FlexiSpot Pro Plus Standing Desk E7 , our top choice, lets you raise or lower your gear with just the push of a button for a moderate price, and we’ve found other quality options that range in price, size, and functionality.
Click to jump to a detailed look at the best standing desks , or check the list below:
TL;DR – These are the Best Standing Desks: FlexiSpot Pro Plus Standing Desk E7 Autonomous SmartDesk Core FlexiSpot Standard Standing Desk E2 Autonomous SmartDesk Corner Secretlab Magnus Pro Uplift V2 4-Leg Standing Desk ApexDesk Pneumatic Stand Desk VIVO 32-inch Desk Converter Xdesk Flex EvoDesk Pro Aviator The best standing desks let you dial in the perfect ergonomics for your setup, whether your behind is in one of the best gaming chairs or you’re looking to stretch your limbs and get the blood flowing while fully vertical. Some options come with multiple motors, premium materials, and a heavy max load to take on beefy PC battle stations, while others tone down features for a simple way to bring your gear higher.
So, no matter what you need, we’ve selected ten great standing desks ready to rise up to the challenge – and find them in the UK .
Best Standing Desks 1. FlexiSpot Pro Plus Standing Desk E7 Best Standing Desk FlexiSpot Pro Plus Standing Desk E7 The E7 is built with thicker leg columns and the column gap is scientifically designed to be 0.05 mm, which is the optimal setting for the stages of columns to move smoothly.

organizations.name: leg standing desk apexdesk pneumatic stand desk vivo
